short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record high quality videos of browsing tabs, quickly and easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply record HiDPI videos of your tabs; no sign-ups, no uploads, no egregious permissions, no tracking.

Configure encoding and framerate and hit record to capture your current tab. Use with the device emulator devtools to perfectly size and capture your mixed-content use case, bug report, or demo.
